subject: Fix notification permission state detection on web reload
body:
Problem:
- After page refresh, notification bell showed as disabled (üîï) even though permissions were previously granted
- OneSignal permission check was running before SDK was fully initialized
- Errors during initialization incorrectly returned 'denied' status

Solution:
- Improved waitForOneSignal() to verify full initialization by testing API calls
- Changed error fallback from 'denied' to 'undetermined' to avoid false negatives
- Added loading state (‚è≥) to bell icon while checking permissions
- Enhanced player ID retrieval with permission validation and warnings

This ensures notification status is accurately reflected after deployments and page refreshes.
title: Fix notification permission state detection on web reload
